text: Is there any way to not display these options on the type: "font"? I tried "false" but no luck.
Have you used `visibility` rules in fields before?
<@U6GNQ7JBU> yes but only on the entire field type.
I am not 100% if it is implemented on the FE but it does support a `hidden_subfields` map
Yea I believe this works right now
doesn't seem to work - but no JSON errors
cc <@U7P6G42AX> I would expect this to work but maybe not implemented yet
